name: The Wingsuit Experience
description:
The Wingsuit Experience is a game of dexterity where you play a "wingsuit experience" in 2d

As the player, you need to reach the airplane without touch the obstacle, use the boost on the map for not fall and collect the coins for more scoring   . 

This game is a student project make in one week, i hope you will enjoy it 

PC Controls

Z and S - Move top or down

Space bar -Start level

Credits

Programming - Mathieu Way

Art and Design - Romain Vuarchex
